definition: abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican

sentences.english: True philosophy was supplanted by dogmatic opinions. The pundits took delight in vain polemics .
sentences.chinese: 梵文学者为了徒劳无益的辩论术而感到高兴。

sentences.english: However, the Indian Sanskrit versions have been largely lost with few remaining.
sentences.chinese: 印度的梵文经典已经散佚失传了，残留下来的很少。

sentences.english: They even say that there is a plaque at the entrance to the temple with Sanskrit writing.
sentences.chinese: 他们还告诉我在庙的入口处还有个写着梵文的匾额。

sentences.english: Buddhism music originated form India, at first, it was chanted with Sanskrit, so called Fanbai.
sentences.chinese: 佛教音乐始于印度，初以梵文念唱又称梵呗。

sentences.english: It is exactly the meaning that its correspondent in Sanscrit has.
sentences.chinese: 确实就是这个意思，梵文里也有对应的意义。

sentences.english: It should be noted that there is a profound relationship between the Kalachakra tantra and the Sanskrit alphabet.
sentences.chinese: 请注意时轮密法与梵文字母之间是有着深厚的渊源。

sentences.english: I could not, nor had I the need to, understand a word of the Sanskrit.
sentences.chinese: 我不懂，但也没必要懂一个梵文字。

sentences.english: Masson began his public life as a Sanskrit scholar.
sentences.chinese: 麦森开始步入社会时是个梵文学者。

sentences.english: The Sanskrit word dhanur means bow-shaped, curved or bent.
sentences.chinese: 梵文意义是弓的形状，弯曲的。

sentences.english: She also teaches Sanskrit, and has memorized many of the yogic scriptures.
sentences.chinese: 她也是梵文教师，能够背诵许多瑜伽经文。

sentences.english: "Bu Tala" is the sound transliteration of ancient Indian Sanskrit, meaning "the holy land of Buddhism".
sentences.chinese: “布达拉”音译自古印度梵文，意思是“佛教圣地”。

sentences.english: There is evidence of the existence of some Hinayana Buddhism of the Sanskrit canon.
sentences.chinese: 有史料证明有崇信梵文佛典的小乖佛教存在。

sentences.english: The words on Dao seem to be Tibetan letter and Devanagari .
sentences.chinese: 刀上的文字似乎是藏文和梵文很象的。

definition: Pali, language of Theravad Pali canon
Om Mani Padme Hum (Sanskrit), or Om Mani Peme Hung (Tibetan), the Avalokiteshvara mantra
pinyin: an3 ma5 ni2 ba1 mi1 hong1
bo1 re3 bo1 luo2 mi4 duo1 xin1 jing1

definition: the six-syllable Sanskrit mantra of Avalokiteshvara bodhisattva (i.e. om mani padme hum)
volumes of classics/volumes of scriptures/ancient scrolls
